mapper.select: select id,title from sa_dt_news where name_id=#{name_id} and type=2
select id, title from sa_dt_news where (select level from sa_dt_news_type where id=sa_dt_news.type) <= #{level};
select id, title from sa_dt_news where type=#{type}
select * from sa_dt_news where (select level from sa_dt_news_type where id=sa_dt_news.type) <= #{level} and media_id!='' order by id desc limit 0,#{rows}
select id, title from sa_dt_news where (type=#{type} or #{type}=1) and (title like "%"#{search_text}"%" or digest like "%"#{search_text}"%")
mapper.insert: insert into sa_dt_news(title, type, consume, name_id, thumb_media_id, author, digest, show_cover_pic, content, need_open_comment, only_fans_can_comment) values(#{title}, #{type}, #{consume}, #{name_id}, #{thumb_media_id}, #{author}, #{digest}, #{show_cover_pic}, #{content}, #{need_open_comment}, #{only_fans_can_comment})
mapper.update: update sa_dt_news set media_id=#{media_id} where id=#{id}
